p: ABTS •+ scavenging activity (%) = ((A Control − A Sample)/A Control) × 100. Total phenolic content: The determination of the total phenolic contents in samples was conducted using the Folin–Ciocalteu reagent and gallic acid as standard, according to Singleton et al. [ 35] modified method. The absorbance measurement was performed at 765 nm on reaction mixtures incubated in a thermostat at 45 °C for 45 min.
